Name: Star Trek Timelines
About the game: Explore the Final Frontier in the ultimate sci-fi strategy RPG, Star Trek Timelines! Join Starfleet and overcome challenges as you boldly go where no game has gone before – across the entire history of Star Trek. FEATURES ● ASSEMBLE YOUR CREW, with hundreds of characters from all the Star Trek worlds including the Original Series, The Next Generation, Deep Space Nine, Voyager, Enterprise and Discovery. Each character has their own unique skills and abilities. Play as your favorite character: Spock, Picard, Captain Kirk, Data, Worf, Janeway, Burnham and many more to choose from. ● COMMAND ICONIC STARSHIPS, including the USS Enterprise, Voyager, Defiant, a Klingon Bird of Prey, the Borg Cube, and many more ● ENGAGE YOUR ENEMIES in stunning 3D ship battles with exciting PvE play or in PvP Battle Arena where you’ll test your crew’s mettle against the best captains in the galaxy. ● EXPLORE THE GALAXY, gaining influence among a dozen factions, including the Federation, the Maquis, the Dominion, the Terran Empire (TOS: “Mirror, Mirror”), and the infamous Section 31 ● CLIMB THE LEADERBOARDS and win rare rewards with special event missions. ● STUNNING GRAPHICS bring the 24th century to life in the most immersive and thrilling Star Trek experience available'
